casebody.data:
Ashley D. Fitts, appellee, v. Felix Martin and Frank J. Buckley, trading as None Such Cartage Company, appellants.Gen. No. 26,769.Action to recover for personal injuries sustained by plaintiff when struck by defendants’ motor truck. Judgment for plaintiff. Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago; the Hon. Samuel H. Trude, Judge, presiding. Heard in the Branch Appellate Court at the March term, 1921.Affirmed.

Barnes, J., took no part in the decision of this case.

Opinion filed March 21, 1922.Otto M. Hamer, for appellants; Robert Branand, Jr., of counsel. West & Eekhart, for appellee. Mr. Justice Morrill

delivered the opinion of the court.
